entry.title: $2300 // Queen size bedroom. ♪♪♪ Closets throughout. Beautifully finis
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 22809
1 Bed / 1 Bath in Crown Heights, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Botanic Garden (FS), Franklin Av (2, 3, 4, 5), Prospect Park (B, FS, Q). SOLID prewar walkup located steps from Botanical Garden and BK Museum. Separate Kitchen and Living space that faces the front of building and looks over your exclusive patio space where any amount of summer gardening and BBQ'ing is bound to take place. This apt is drenched in sunlight! Stainless Steel kitchen appliances. Queen size bedroom. Closets throughout. Beautifully finished bathroom with large deep soaking tub. Private parking garage available and backside of building as rec space.

AMENITIES
Natural Light in Living Area
Private parking
Stainless Steel Appliances
Patio
Terrace
Shared backyard
Outdoor Space
